description:
A free and simple file viewer for CSV files.

CSV Viewer is a free and simple file viewer for CSV files, it can quickly open and format the data in the (*.csv) files, help you to easily browse and view, it is easy to use very much and completely free. CSV file is a comma-separated values file (Comma Separated Value), it is a plain text file format that is used to store data, usually used in a spreadsheet or database software.
